      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Mapper_Order.addStockById(int idMaterial, int stock) 
      static List<Model_Order> Mapper_Order.allOrders()
      This method takes all orders in the database and puts them in an arraylist.
      static List<Model_Order> Mapper_Order.allOrdersByUserID(int idUser)
      Gets all orders made by a specific user, from the UserID from the database

      Creates invoice and inserts into database.

      Method to create an order of a carport, and add it to the database
      static Model_OrderDetails Mapper_Order.createOrderDetail(Model_OrderDetails od)
      Creates orderdetails and inserts set order into the database
      static List<Model_Invoice> Mapper_Order.getInvoice(int idUser)
      Gets the invoice of the user based on the userID from the database.
      static List<Model_Stock> Mapper_Order.getStock() 
      static int Mapper_Order.getStockIdByMaterial(String material)
      gets materialId based on material description, so that we can use it in updateStockById.
      static Model_Invoice Mapper_Order.specificInvoiceDetails(int idOrder)
      Gets specific invoice based on orderID
      static Model_Order Mapper_Order.specificOrder(int idOrder)
      Gets a specific order based on the order's ID from the database.
      static Model_OrderDetails Mapper_Order.specificOrderDetails(int idOrder)
      Retrives the specific order and the details based on the Id of set order.
      static void Mapper_Order.updateStockById(int stockUsed, int idMaterial)
      Updates the stocklist, by using the materials used, when the order is created, and using the id we got from getStockIdByMaterial.
